p: The phytoconstituents of 6 medicinal plants i.e. C. verum, C. longa, O. tenuiflorum, P. nigrum, Vitis Vinifera, Z. officinale were retrieved from ChEBI ( https://www.ebi.ac.uk/chebi/) database. The targets of each phytoconstituents were identified using DIGEP-Pred [ 4] for proteins at the pharmacological activity (Pa) > 0.7.
